description: This table is a bridge between concept context SmartData element values and the source SmartData element value records.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: PARENT_HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked concept record that is associated with the SmartData element value.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record linked to the SmartData element. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.
